description.en: Top half of a Split Wide layout. Evening dusk settles over the battlefield. Döbeln, dismounted, walks slowly among the fallen. His uniform is torn and stained with smoke. Around him, Swedish soldiers assist the wounded while field surgeons kneel beside makeshift stretchers.

narration.en: Silence returns — the cost of courage lies in the grass.

info: Page 11 – Aftermath. PageType: 2. Scene (panel 1): Döbeln walking among the wounded at dusk, surgeons tending to the fallen.
